import React from "react"; import "./profile.css"; import PhoneInput from "react-phone-input-2"; import { getProfile, updateProfile } from "../backend/apiconnector"; // import axios from 'axios'; import "react-phone-input-2/lib/style.css"; class ProfilePage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { fullName: "", // lastName: "", email: "", alterEmail: "", mobile: "", alterMobile: "", city: "", country: "", college: "", graduationDate: "", degree: "", major: "", linkedIn: "", github: "", line: "", weChat: "", }; this.onFormSubmit = this.onFormSubmit.bind(this); } componentWillMount() { if(localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-user")&&localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-tokens")){ var email = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-user")).email getProfile(email).then (res => { if(res.status==='success'){ this.setState({ fullName: res.user.fullName, email: res.user.email, alterEmail: res.user.alterEmail || "", mobile: res.user.mobile, alterMobile: res.user.alterMobile || "", city: res.user.city || "", country: res.user.country || "", college: res.user.college || "", graduationDate: res.user.graduationDate || "", degree: res.user.degree || "", major: res.user.major || "", linkedIn: res.user.linkedIn || "", github: res.user.github || "", line: res.user.line || "", weChat: res.user.weChat || "" }) } }).catch(err => console.log(err)) } // if(localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-user")&&localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-tokens")){ // var email = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-user")).email // var tokens = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-tokens")) // axios.post(`${appconfig.apiurl}/auth/getprofile`,{ email: email },{ // headers: { // "Authorization" : `Bearer ${tokens.accessToken}` //read token from localstorage here // } // }).then(res => { // if(res.data.status==='success'){ // console.log(res.data.user) // this.setState({ // fullName: res.data.user.fullName, // email: res.data.user.email, // alterEmail: res.data.user.alterEmail || "", // mobile: res.data.user.mobile, // alterMobile: res.data.user.alterMobile || "", // city: res.data.user.city || "", // country: res.data.user.country || "", // college: res.data.user.college || "", // graduationDate: res.data.user.graduationDate || "", // degree: res.data.user.degree || "", // major: res.data.user.major || "", // linkedIn: res.data.user.linkedIn || "", // github: res.data.user.github || "", // line: res.data.user.line || "", // weChat: res.data.user.weChat || "" // }) // } // }).catch(err => console.log(err)) // } } onFormSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); if(localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-user")&&localStorage.getItem("student-nation.com-tokens")){ updateProfile(this.state).then(res => { if(res.status==='success'){ let element = document.querySelector('.success'); element.classList.remove('hidden'); } }).catch(err => console.log(err)) } // axios.post(`${appconfig.apiurl}/auth/updateprofile`,{ // profile: this.state // }).then(res => { // if(res.data.status==='success'){ // let element = document.querySelector('.success'); // element.classList.remove('hidden'); // } // }).catch(err => console.log(err)) // console.log(this.state) } render() { return ( <>

Profile

this.setState({ fullName: e.target.value }) } />
{/*
this.setState({ lastName: e.target.value }) } />
*/}
this.setState({ email: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ alterEmail: e.target.value }) } />
this.setState({ mobile })} />
this.setState({ alterMobile }) } />
this.setState({ city: e.target.value })} />
this.setState({ country: e.target.value }) } />

Education

this.setState({ college: e.target.value }) } />
this.setState({ degree: e.target.value }) } />

On the Web

this.setState({ linkedIn: e.target.value }) } />
this.setState({ github: e.target.value }) } />
this.setState({ weChat: e.target.value }) } />
this.setState({ line: e.target.value })} />

Your profile has been updated!

); } } export default ProfilePage;
